bibl.author: William Cook
bibl.title: William Cook to Louisa Van Velsor Whitman, 19 February 1865
bibl.orgName: Yale Walt Whitman Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

div1.p: I enclose the memorandum your son gave me Feb 14th. If I can tell you anything further, myself, about him I shall be happy to do so.

George W. Whitman
Capt. 51st Regt, N.Y.Vols. Prisoner of war at Danville Va in tip top health and spirits.
Mother Address. Mrs Louisa Whitman, Portland Ave near Myrtle Ave, Brooklyn N.Y.
